body:
`spack install xsdk` producess the following error:
```
==> Error: Invalid spec: 'metis@5.1.0%gcc@5.4.0~debug~gdb~int64~real64+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 ^cmake@3.7.1%gcc@5.4.0~doc+ncurses+openssl+ownlibs~qt arch=linux-centos7-x86_64'. Package metis requires variant +real64, but spec asked for ~real64
```
I looked at the metis package and can't figure out where the '~real64' is coming from.
title: ~real64 instead of +real64
